name: Barbara
John of Damascus
troparia: (Tone 8) Let us honour the holy martyr Barbara,* for as a bird she escaped the snares of the enemy,** and destroyed them through the help and defense of the cross!

(Tone 8) Champion of orthodoxy, teacher of purity and of true worship,* the enlightener of the universe and the adornment of the hierarchs:* all-wise father John, your teachings have gleamed with light upon all things.** Intercede before Christ our God to save our souls!
kontakia: (Tone 4) O passion-bearer, following God Who is piously hymned as the Trinity,* you dulled the idol-worshipping.* Suffering amid your martyrdom, O Barbara,* you were not frightened of the orders of the tormentor, O manly of mind,* in a loud voice unceasingly chanting* "I worship the Trinity, the One God!"

(Tone 4) Let us hymn John, the hymnographer* and the precious theologian,* the instructor and teacher of the Church,* and the opponent of the enemy;* for taking up the weapon of the Cross of the Lord,* he defended against every delusion of heresies,* and as a fervent intercessor before God* he delivers forgiveness of transgressions to all.
